attributes.action: keep an independent nuclear deterrent for Britain, and thus the wider EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great Britain's independence and security in part of last century and in the coming century, whether we like it or not, was and will be from having a nuclear arsenal. We should keep a modern weapons programme as long as it is necessary to, with the hope that one day they will become obsolete and we can decommission them.
